description: Number of independent sets of vertices in graph K_5 X C_n (n > 2).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,6,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[6, 1, 31]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 4*Self(n-1)+6*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 17 2012
author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Dec 19 1999
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 20 1999
